Articles.Content:
So, I've been playing KSP for a while and while I like the Stock command pods I want more!

Does anyone know of any mods that have Good command pods? (I'm not looking for more of anything else, just pods)
I think there aren't, but you can always download a mod and delete the parts that you don't need/like.

ALCOR has awesome glass cockpit monitors and is simply better than stock command pods (and lander cans).

MPSS Nautilius pack has command pod with large window that provides vast field of vision.

Deep space mmission pack has command pod copied from "Space Odyssey" Discovery crew module.

I agree on the ALCOR command pod! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-WIP-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%28UPD-24-11-2013%29

It is simply outstanding!

I am currently looking for a good rover comand pod. the stock cupola have the looks but is simply too heavy. 4.5 tonnes is too much, and makes the rover unbalanced and cause it to flip over to easy

You should check out http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/41700-WIP-PARTS-Random-Parts-Mod

I haven't tried it yet, but there appears to be several cool looking command pods included in it
Novapunch has some non-stock pods as well.
This mod would've worked wonders had it not been outdated. Meanwhile you can use this alternative if you don't mind the pod being unmanned.
